welcome_message_body: "Welcome to La Magdalena Chichicaspa, a charming city known for its rich cultural heritage and beautiful landscapes. We invite you to explore and experience all that this wonderful destination has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and busiest terminal at Internacional Benito Juarez Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A modern and spacious terminal at Internacional Benito Juarez Airport, mainly serving international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Internacional Benito Juarez Airport, dedicated to serving international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Licenciado Adolfo Lopez Mateos International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The secondary terminal of Licenciado Adolfo Lopez Mateos International Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
